#summary The navigator.vendor property
#labels about-dom,is-dom-property

== Values ==

The `navigator.vendor` property returns a string.
  * [BrowserFamilyFirefox Firefox] returns an empty string.
  * [BrowserFamilySafari Safari] returns the string `"Apple Computer, Inc."`

This property is read-only.
